00017 bool keywordIf(MavenCompiler* c, string line, string& close) {
00018         int actionStart;
00019         StringList questiontype, actiontype;
00020         MavenMutability mut, mut2;
00021         string question = dissectCode(c, getStatementQuestion(line, actionStart), questiontype, mut);
00022         
00023         // before we dissect the action we need to make sure these is no extra statements
00024         string preaction = trim(line.substr(actionStart, line.length() - actionStart));
00025         
00026         // !C001
00027         if(startsWith(preaction, "if")) {
00028                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, string("if(") + question + ") {");
00029                 close = "}/*if*/" + close;
00030                 keywordIf(c, preaction, close);
00031                 return true;
00032         }
00033         if(startsWith(preaction, "for")) {
00034                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, string("if(") + question + ") {");
00035                 close = "}/*if*/" + close;
00036                 keywordFor(c, preaction, close);
00037                 return true;
00038         }
00039         if(startsWith(preaction, "while")) {
00040                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, string("if(") + question + ") {");
00041                 close = "}/*if*/" + close;
00042                 keywordWhile(c, preaction, close);
00043                 return true;
00044         }
00045         
00046         string action = dissectCode(c, preaction, actiontype, mut2);
00047         
00048         // !C003
00049         writeAutoCPPLine(c, objectCheckCPP(c));
00050         writeAutoCPPLine(c, string("if(") + question + ") {");
00051         if(trim(action) != "")
00052                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, action + ";");
00053         close = "}/*if*/" + close;
00054         
00055         return true;
00056 }
